quotes: In 2017, she starred in Netflix's Mudbound, directed by Dee Rees.
In 2018, she starred in Paul Dano's directorial debut film Wildlife with Jake Gyllenhaal.
In 2020, Mulligan starred in Emerald Fennell's black comedy thriller film Promising Young Woman, alongside Bo Burnham and Alison Brie.
Mulligan at an event for Maestro in 2023

organizations.name: Netflix
quotes: In 2017, she starred in Netflix's Mudbound, directed by Dee Rees.

organizations.name: Rotten Tomatoes
quotes: On review aggregator Rotten Tomatoes, the film has an approval rating of 97% with the consensus reading, 'Mudbound offers a well-acted, finely detailed snapshot of American history whose scenes of rural class struggle resonate far beyond their period setting.'

organizations.name: Academy Award
quotes: The film earned four Academy Award nominations including Best Adapted Screenplay for Rees.

organizations.name: BBC Two
quotes: Mulligan stepped back into television as a Detective Inspector in Collateral, a BBC Two limited series, receiving plaudits from American and British critics.

organizations.name: Minetta Lane Theatre
quotes: Mulligan starred off Broadway in the solo show, Girls and Boys at the Minetta Lane Theatre.

organizations.name: Sundance Film Festival
quotes: She also served as an executive producer on the film, which debuted at the 2020 Sundance Film Festival to great acclaim.

roles.title: Detective Inspector
quotes: Mulligan stepped back into television as a Detective Inspector in Collateral, a BBC Two limited series, receiving plaudits from American and British critics.

roles.title: executive producer
quotes: She also served as an executive producer on the film, which debuted at the 2020 Sundance Film Festival to great acclaim.
Mulligan starred off Broadway in the solo show, Girls and Boys at the Minetta Lane Theatre.

supporting_quotes: In 2017, she starred in Netflix's Mudbound, directed by Dee Rees.
In 2018, she starred in Paul Dano's directorial debut film Wildlife with Jake Gyllenhaal.
In 2020, Mulligan starred in Emerald Fennell's black comedy thriller film Promising Young Woman, alongside Bo Burnham and Alison Brie.
Mulligan stepped back into television as a Detective Inspector in Collateral, a BBC Two limited series, receiving plaudits from American and British critics.
Mulligan starred off Broadway in the solo show, Girls and Boys at the Minetta Lane Theatre.
She also served as an executive producer on the film, which debuted at the 2020 Sundance Film Festival to great acclaim.
